explains: n. 露面，演出；出庭，到场；外表，外观；表面现象，假象；出现；起源，问世；表现；出版，广播
wordGroup: in appearance adv. 在外表上
outward appearance 外观；外表
elegant appearance 美观大方
appearance quality 外观质量
external appearance 外观；外形
physical appearance 外貌，外表；物理性质；体态
attractive appearance 造型美观
aesthetic appearance 式样美观
personal appearance 个人形象，仪表
surface appearance 表观；表面状况
fracture appearance 断口外观
general appearance 一般外貌；一般性出庭
appearance of weld 焊缝成形
make an appearance 出席；到达
exterior appearance 外观
final appearance 最终外观
make one's appearance 登台；出现
cameo appearance [俚]友情客串（名演员饰演小角色）
architectural appearance 建筑外形
put in an appearance 露面；到场一会儿

sentences.en: Don't be fooled by his appearance.
sentences.cn: 不要被他的外表所蒙蔽。

sentences.en: She sets great store by her appearance.
sentences.cn: 她十分看重自己的外貌。

sentences.en: He worries obsessively about his appearance.
sentences.cn: 他过度烦恼自己的外表。
